text: Why do i have to be autisticI can t stop defining myself  That s all I can do  Everyone around me takes one good look at me and they know I have autism  They won t give me a chance  They re nice to me because they re afraid to see through me  I m not rainman  and I m not some hidden sociopath waiting for mass destruction  I just want to be treated equally  and I ve tried my damned best  but it only gets worse  I lose chances to make friends  my self esteem drops  and every day I keep thinking all the possible ways I m going to die  Alone  A virgin  Let s face it  Society expects nothing from me  I m like Chris Chan to everyone I meet  It doesn t matter if I ve graduated high school and im doing well in community college  I just want it all to end  It s so hard to get up in the mornings knowing that I m not worthy of love  money  or even a healthy  happy life  No sane girl would want to date of love me  I might be skinny and handsome to some on the outside  but on the inside  I m suffering  I m misreble  I almost killed myself in high school because I couldn t take harder courses and everyone was making fun of me thinking I was going to be a failure because my disability gets in the way of learning  My life is over  I m not going to go to community college  be a virgin and work at a McDonald s  especially after the hell I ve been through enough in my life  I don t even know how I lived through so much  taking care of a disabled father  doing homework without anyone s help  and yet  here I am  Still breathing  Alive  I think will power keeps me alive  I m done  I just can t do it  I just want it all done and over with

text: Dunno what to say here I m miserable all the time  Near as I can tell my thought process goes as such  I don t socialize well  and dont know how  This means I dont fit in with me too many folks  This makes me lonely  which is about as fun as performing an exploratory rectal exam  So in turn I end kind of whiny and pretty insecure  Which just alienates folks more and adds a hefty dose of self loathing into the mix  cause I hate when I do that  but I cant seem to help it sometimes  On the flip side if I dont express those emotions I end up distant and reserved  which also alienates folks  I cant seem to find an in between  and this mentality is killing me  Would rather be dead sometimes than such a whiny bastard  Sorry for unloading on y all

text: My first ever fight So I was walking over to the royal palace with my bodyguards  obviously  but I heard some rustling in some bushed  I gently tip toes towards the bush  my heart pounding  my veins swelling and my toes crumbling to wards the ground  As I got closer the rustling got louder and more vicious  When I heard this I yelled to the bush   Rustle one more time and your gonna smell my toes  As I said that in an instant a man jumped out and said  who dares cross I king Henry the viii  Unless u wanna battle  he drew his sword towards me while I took out my golf stick  He was the first to deliver a strike  With his golf stick sauring through the air while I managed to block it with my right thumb  I yelled  is that all you can do bitch  So I struck my golf stick at his head causing a shockwave that caused a neighbouring volcano to errupt it landed on his ribs and he was on the floor  I knew this was my chance so I grabbed a pen and I shoved it through his eye  blood oozing out whilst I retracted the pen out in slow motion  And I was about to use his own sword against him until he said   Your a man who deserves honour  your a man of shear will and your a man who deserves recognition  That is why you deserve to have the title  the great  if you finish me off you will never keep that title and if you don t the people of the far countries will respect you and want you  so what do you say   and I knew exactly what my answer was
summary: It was my first ever fight. I was walking over to the royal palace with my bodyguards. I heard some rustling in a bush. A man jumped out and said who dares cross I king Henry the viii. He drew his sword towards me while I took out my golf stick. He was the first to deliver a strike. I blocked it with my right thumb. I struck his head with the golf stick at his head causing a shockwave that caused a neighbouring volcano to errupt. He fell on the floor. I shoved a pen through his eye.
cleaned: fight walk royal palace bodyguard hear rustle bush man jump say dare cross king henry vii draw sword take golf stick deliver strike block right thumb strike head golf stick head cause shockwave cause neighbour volcano erupt fall floor shove pen eye
